data.name: Digital Transformation EXPO Manchester 2020
data.description: The North of England’s largest IT event, powered by cloud, infrastructure, cyber security and IT. Whatever your interest, pain points or aspirations there’s something for you. Topics include; DevOps & Serverless, Cyber Security, Cloud, Networks & Infrastructure, AI, Analytics & IoT.
